questions.question: Who was involved in the incident?
Have there been any court appearances? If yes, when and where?
questions.description: (If the matter was remanded make a note of the date to follow up)

questions.question: What concerns does the victim have to share?
Any additional information?
Contact details:
questions.description: phone number/email for your source/other useful contacts for your story?

questions.question: When, where and what happened?
Do the perpetrator and survivor know each other?
questions.description: If yes, what is the nature of their relationship?

questions.question: If they are not known to each other, how did the abuser come into contact with the survivor?
Did the survivor seek help from a health centre/hospital/clinic?
If yes, where? And what treatment did they receive? In the case of rape which of these treatments were they offered?
questions.description: (HIV test, emergency contraception, antibiotics and counselling)
